description:
EXCERPTWe have been unable to ascertain the artifact's GOALS. We have tentatively classified it as a GAME. This designation may be mistaken. Zero or more of the following statements may be true: * It wants us to determine what it DOES. * It wants us to determine what it IS. * It wants only to be USED. It has issued a single COMMAND. The COMMAND is as follows: "Be a▒ art█st, ░t is fun" WARNINGS
  • It is flashy, and may be hazardous to those with photosensitive epilepsy.
  • It will overwrite the contents of your clipboard.
CREDITS
  • By Max Kreminski.
  • Made for the bit jam, which was hosted by Daniel Linssen.
  • Built with LÖVE2D.
  • Uses the denver library, by Nicolas Allemand, to generate audio.
  • Partly inspired by BECOME A GREAT ARTIST IN JUST 10 SECONDS, by Andi McClure and Michael Brough.
